title: FS: T206 Sovereign Sam Crawford "throwing" SGC graded
author: whitehse

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Sovereign Sam Crawford "throwing" SGC graded
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a T206 Sovereign Sam Crawford that has been graded Authentic from SGC.  The card presents well with no visible creases.  I Am not sure the reason behind the "authentic" designation.  

SOLD......

Thank you to all who inquired
